FuncDef: This command configures the types of RIP updates that will be accepted and processed.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that RIP updates in either version 1 or version 2 format will be accepted.
Specifies that RIP updates will not be accepted.
Specifies that RIP updates in version 1 format only will be accepted.
Specifies that RIP updates in version 2 format only will be accepted.

ExtraInfo: Default: receive both - in the config>router>rip contextreceive version-1 - in the config>router>ripng context
